name: DAV - Disabled American Veterans
description: DAV (Disabled American Veterans) is a nonprofit organization providing lifetime support to veterans of all generations, their families, and survivors at no cost. The organization helps more than a million veterans annually with VA benefits assistance, medical transportation, employment services, transition services, and claims assistance. DAV is veterans serving veterans with nearly a million members nationwide.
source: Verified from official DAV website and contact information
notes: National veterans service organization with headquarters in Erlanger, KY. Also has Washington, DC office at 1300 I Street NW, Suite 400 West, Washington, DC 20005. Phone: (877) I AM A VET. Provides comprehensive support to disabled veterans and their families including VA benefits assistance, medical transportation, employment services, and transition support.
